title: Reduce duplicate playlist tracks fetch on playlists refresh
description: Investigate why api/playlists/:id/tracks is requested multiple times on playlists page refresh; propose steps to reduce to a single shared fetch.

comments.author: ian
comments.text: Found two direct callers of PlaylistsApi.getPlaylistTracks: PlaylistService.activePlaylistTracks$ (src/app/core/services/playlist-service.ts) and PlaylistTracks component (src/app/features/playlists/playlist-tracks/playlist-tracks.ts). On app init, PlayerFacade constructor calls setPlaylistAndPlay (sets active playlist), and App constructor calls setActivePlaylist, plus PlaylistService constructor triggers refreshTracks once. Likely 3 API calls on refresh from playlist-id changes + direct component fetch.

comments.author: ian
comments.text: Note: PlayerFacade constructor calls setPlaylistAndPlay$(2) (sets active playlist), App constructor calls setActivePlaylist$(1), and PlaylistService constructor triggers refreshTracks once. This likely explains 3 track fetches on refresh.
